data.comment: The match is underway in Luton.
Goal! George Moncur gives Luton a 1-0 lead in Luton.
In the minute 17, Luton's James Shea has been booked in Luton.
Emiliano Buendia is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Matty Pearson puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
In the minute 33, Przemyslaw Placheta for Norwich has been booked by Darren England and receives a first yellow card.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
James Bree is replacing Martin Cranie for Luton at Kenilworth Road.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Kenilworth Road.
It's now 3-1 in Luton as James Collins scores for Luton.
The home team have replaced George Moncur with Joe Morrell. This is the second substitution made today by Nathan Jones.
In the minute 72, Mario Vrancic is replacing Alexander Tettey for the away team.
Daniel Farke (Norwich) is making a second substitution, with Christoph Zimmermann replacing Emiliano Buendia.
Christoph Zimmermann (Norwich) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 85, Norwich make their third substitution with Tyrese Omotoye replacing Josh Martin.
The match has come to a close in Luton. The final score is 3-1.
Nathan Jones is making the team's third substitution at Kenilworth Road with Dan Potts replacing Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall.
